CommandDefinition.Name: setradiusdomaintypespecificdata
CommandDefinition.Description: Assigns the specified RadiusDomaintypeSpecificData to the specified domain.

Argument.Name: domainName
Argument.Description: The domain for which the information will be set

Argument.Name: associatedOrdertype
Argument.Description: The ordertype of the workflow that is started for authentication requests

Argument.Name: servers
Argument.Description: Multiple servers can be specified in the form <IPv4/IPv6>,<Port>,<PresharedKey>
